company.name: Midtown Commercial Real Estate
company.tagline: New York's boutique tenant and landlord representative
company.description: Midtown Commercial Real Estate represents tenants and landlords in fulfilling their property needs. We walk tenants through each step of the process, working to identify properties that fit their unique business needs. We work diligently to represent our landlord clients in identifying tenants for their properties. With over 30 years in the industry and having worked with over 2 million square feet of space, we have the experience needed to service your requests.
company.address: 450 Seventh Avenue, Suite 2702, New York, New York 10123

hero.headline: Take Your Business to a Better Space
hero.subheadline: New York's boutique tenant and landlord representative helping to service your every need

about.headline: Who Are We
about.content: Midtown Commercial Real Estate is New York's boutique tenant and landlord representative helping to service your every need! With over 30 years in the industry and having worked with over 2 million square feet of space, we have the experience needed to service your requests. Our firm is composed of over 10 highly experienced brokers, each specialized in specific sectors of commercial real estate.

values.title: Tenant Representation
values.description: At no cost to the tenant, we do the due diligence required to find you the perfect property for your business

values.title: Landlord Representation
values.description: Our agents give buyers and other brokers the tools to see and show your spaces to more clients

values.title: 30+ Years Experience
values.description: Over 30 years in the industry and having worked with over 2 million square feet of space
